column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Ummi says : " A betrothal necklace ? "
#Text=Kuruk says : " Ummi , will you marry me ? "
#Text=Ummi says : " Yes ! "
#Text=Kuruk says : " We were to be married in the Spirit Oasis .
#Text=No !
#Text=" Kuruk says : " Ummi fell into the spirit pond , as if some unseen force pulled her in .
#Text=" Kuruk says : " She 's gone ... " Kuruk says : " She did n't drown .
#Text=She disappeared into the Spirit World ... Koh took her to punish me for my past mistakes .
#Text=Every year , on the anniversary of our wedding , I traveled to the Spirit World hoping to save my wife from Koh .
#Text=But I failed .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry .
#Text=I know how that feels .
#Text=Wait !
#Text=I 've seen her !
#Text=Koh still has her !
#Text=When I was in Koh 's lair , he showed me Ummi 's face !
#Text=" Kuruk says : " Thank you , Aang .
#Text=My search is not over yet .
#Text=I will keep hunting Koh until Ummi and I are reunited .
#Text=Hurry !
#Text=Avatar Yangchen is waiting for you !
#Text=" Aang says : " Hello ?
#Text=Avatar Yangchen ?
#Text=Anyone here ?
#Text=" Yangchen says : " It 's an honor to meet you , Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's been such an amazing experience to meet my past lives .
#Text=" Yangchen says : " And what did you learn by meeting them ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Well ... I realized that no Avatar is perfect .
#Text=They all struggled and made mistakes .
#Text=Like me .
#Text=" Yangchen says : " Very wise .
#Text=" Aang says : " But it made me wonder - why is the Avatar Spirit a human in every life ?
#Text=Would n't it be better if the Avatar was an all powerful spirit that never died ?
#Text=" Yangchen says : " I do n't think so .
#Text=The Avatar must be compassionate towards all people ... and the only way to do that is to live with them .
#Text=The Avatar must experience sadness ... Anger ... Joy ... and happiness .
#Text=By feeling all these emotions , it helps you understand how precious human life is ... so you will do anything to protect it .
#Text=If you were an all powerful spirit living on the top of some mountain , you would n't have much in common with an ordinary person .
#Text=So the Avatar continues to take human rebirth .
#Text=And with each life , learns what it means to be human .
#Text=" Aang says : " Now that I 've reconnected with all of you , does that mean the Avatar Spirit is okay ?
#Text=" Yangchen says : " Yes , but your physical body is still injured .
#Text=You need time to heal .
#Text=And unfortunately , it seems your ability to enter the Avatar State has been disrupted .
#Text=You wo n't be able to rely on your past lives to help you .
#Text=You must rely on your friends .
#Text=And when you wake up , you wo n't remember this journey to the Spirit World .
#Text=It will be like a forgotten dream .
#Text=Until we meet again , Aang .

#Text=" Main Aang Fang Hei Bai Kuruk Kyoshi Roku Yangchen Antagonists Koh ( flashback only ) says : " Minor 46th Earth King ( flashback only ) Appa ( flashback only ) Dai Li ( flashback only ) Kaja ( flashback only ) Katara ( flashback only ) Momo ( flashback only ) Royal Earthbender Guards ( flashback only ) Tui and La ( flashback only ) Ummi ( flashback only ) Toph ( flashback only ) Yue "
